statements: UPDATE biometric_data SET retina_data = 'new_retina_data', fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_data SET face_data = 'new_face_data', retina_data = 'updated_retina_data' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = '\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE biometric_data SET retina_data = '\xABCDEF0123456789', face_data = '\x9876543210FEDCBA' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE BiometricData SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE AccessLogs SET result = 'Approved', accessed_at = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 456;
UPDATE BiometricData SET fingerprint_data = E'\x31415926535897932384626433832795' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE AccessLogs SET accessed_at = '2022-01-15 12:30:00', action = 'Login', result = 'Success' WHERE user_id = 200;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = '\x00112233', timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE username = 'user1';
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = decode('101010', 'hex'), user_id = 15, timestamp = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE biometric_users SET username = 'alice' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE access_levels SET access_type = 'admin' WHERE level_name = 'superuser';
UPDATE biometric_users SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE access_logs SET log_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, action = 'login' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE biometric_users SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE facial_scans SET image_data=DECODE('aGVsbG8gd29ybGQ=', 'base64'), scan_timestamp=current_timestamp WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE biometric_users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE facial_scans SET scan_data = E'\xDEADBEEF'::BYTEA, scan_timestamp = '2022-05-18 12:30:00' WHERE scan_id = 201;
